name: Taking Valhalla VR
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NIVIDIA GTX 970 or Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NIVIDIA GT 980 TI DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 16 GB available space Additional Notes: These are the specs in which the game was developed on.
